summary: Project now focused on reverting to the previous app version/design (bottom navigation icons) and restoring the Profile page plus Deeds battery usage and Deeds report card features.
known_issues: Current build/regression: new icon update is disliked; user requests rollback to prior version with bottom navigation and restored Profile/Deeds features.

existing_features.title: Restore the previous primary navigation layout with the main icons fixed at the bottom of the screen (bottom tab navigation), replacing the current updated/high-tech icon navigation experience.

Restore the Profile page experience from the prior version so the Profile route (/profile) works correctly and presents the expected profile content and actions (view/edit profile, posts, followers/following, notifications, etc.).
Restore the Deeds battery usage feature so users can see the DeedsBar battery-style session timer and daily usage limit UI as part of the user experience (as it was in the old version).
Restore the Deeds report card feature (“Grade Deeds Report Card”) so it is accessible again as part of the app experience (as it was in the old version).

new_feature_requests.summary: Revert to old UI layout with icons at the bottom (undo new high-tech icon update)
Restore the Profile page from the old version
Restore the Deeds battery usage feature from the old version
Restore the Deeds report card feature from the old version
